synopsis.text: It's a new era where litter-picking has evolved into a thrilling global sport known as SpoGomi, rivaling soccer's popularity. In this world, Akari, an introverted girl with a deep love for the environment, finds herself overshadowed by her peers. Her life takes a dramatic turn when she encounters Tokio, a gifted and charismatic SpoGomi athlete adored by all. Together with young people worldwide, they embark on an inspiring journey to cleanse their surroundings of waste, transforming towns, rivers, and oceans through the power of SpoGomi. As the first anime produced simultaneously in Japanese and English, SpoGomi: World Cup Exhibition Match Arc brings a unique and captivating tale to audiences across the globe.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
